title: Great American British Continental Railway Railroad War Journeys
description:
Great American British Continental Railway Railroad War Journeys - Slimoo
 

===================== NOTE =====================


These are not really about Trains
Michael Portillo takes a rail Journey and meets people along the way

It's more of a Travel History Documentary



=================================================

Great British Railway Journeys is a travelogue documentary presented by Michael Portillo.

 



In the series, Portillo travels around guided by a Victorian guidebook written by George Bradshaw, and compares how the destinations have changed between Victorian and modern times.
 
 
 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_British_Railway_Journeys
 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Continental_Railway_Journeys
  
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b04ddmt3
